outline:
1. to rise, come forth, break out, arise, rise up, shine
    1. (Qal)
      1. to rise
      2. to come out, appear
kjv_def: arise, rise (up), as soon as it is up.
strongs_def: properly, to irradiate (or shoot forth beams), i.e. to rise (as the sun); specifically, to appear (as a symptom of leprosy)
